properties.scriptContent:
Uninstall-Module -Name Az -AllVersions
Install-Module -Name Az.Accounts -RequiredVersion 2.7.1 -Force
Install-Module -Name Az.Synapse -RequiredVersion 0.7.0 -Force
$User = 'moiz@emumbapvtgmail.onmicrosoft.com'
$PWord = ConvertTo-SecureString -String 'Gooner4life97' -AsPlainText -Force
$Credential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $User, $PWord
Connect-AzAccount -Credential $Credential
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moiz491/ADF-Synapse-try/synapse_collab/linkedService/HttpServer1.json -OutFile '~/HttpServer1-LinkedService.json'
Set-AzSynapseLinkedService -WorkspaceName moizsynapsetry2 -Name HttpServer1 -DefinitionFile '~/HttpServer1-LinkedService.json'
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri  https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moiz491/ADF-Synapse-try/synapse_collab/linkedService/AzureBlobStorage1.json -OutFile '~/AzureBlobStorage-LinkedService.json'
Set-AzSynapseLinkedService -WorkspaceName moizsynapsetry2 -Name AzureBlobStorage1 -DefinitionFile '~/AzureBlobStorage-LinkedService.json'
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri  https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moiz491/ADF-Synapse-try/synapse_collab/dataset/Source_Connection.json -OutFile '~/Source_Connection-Dataset.json'
Set-AzSynapseDataset -WorkspaceName moizsynapsetry2 -Name Source_Connection -DefinitionFile '~/Source_Connection-Dataset.json'
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri  https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moiz491/ADF-Synapse-try/synapse_collab/dataset/Destination_Conection.json -OutFile '~/Destination_Conection-Dataset.json'
Set-AzSynapseDataset -WorkspaceName moizsynapsetry2 -Name Destination_Conection -DefinitionFile '~/Destination_Conection-Dataset.json'
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri  https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moiz491/ADF-Synapse-try/synapse_collab/pipeline/Pipeline%201.json -OutFile '~/Pipeline.json'
Set-AzSynapsePipeline -WorkspaceName moizsynapsetry2 -Name 'Pipeline 1' -DefinitionFile '~/Pipeline.json'
Invoke-AzSynapsePipeline -WorkspaceName moizsynapsetry2 -PipelineName 'Pipeline 1'
